scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Hillaryunderwood
scrape.text: This book makes you want to keep turning the page but with each page turn you hate yourself for turning the page. The characters are unlikeable, dark, and show the underbelly of evil masked as normalcy. The characters justify their evil with neatly packaged logic and necessity that left me feeling that tinge of uneasiness that starts quietly then begins roaring even after the last page was finished.
